global_rules: Must view all NULL values as normal.
All values are in VARCHAR format, which means "null" is also VARCHAR.

vital_signs.name: datetimes
descriptions: Datetime of each vital signs record.

out_table_schema.name: datetimes
descriptions: Datetime of each vital signs record.

out_table_schema.name: has_fever
descriptions: Is `true` only if body temperature is larger than 38.

out_table_schema.name: hypothermia
descriptions: Is `true` only if body temperature is lower than 35.

out_table_schema.name: tachypnea
descriptions: Is `true` only if respiratory rate is higher than 20.

out_table_schema.name: brachypnea
descriptions: Is `true` only if respiratory rate is lower than 10.

out_table_schema.name: hypertension
descriptions: Is `true` when systolic pressure is larger than 140.
Is `true` when diastolic pressure is larger than 90.

out_table_schema.name: hypotension
descriptions: Is `true` when systolic pressure is lower than 100.
Is `true` when diastolic pressure is lower than 60.

out_table_schema.name: desaturation
descriptions: Is `true` only if blood oxygen saturation lower than 0.9.

sth_to_note: Do not view any empty values as abnormal
Directly query from input tables, do not create any new table.
